attributes.action: Take The Financial Burden out of Cancer
attributes.additional_details:
As a cancer patient all your fight and energy goes into battling this illness and the gruelling treatment. You should not need to fight the benefit agency also.
Unfortunately I was diagnosed in March 2011 I knew had a battle on my hands. On turning to the benefits agency for financial support to who I have contributed to all my working life I had another fight on my hands and one I did not want or need. I was just looking for financial support for my family to help pay bills and survive; only to find my dealings with the benefit agency was more stressful and emotional draining than cancer itself. At least with cancer you have plan a knowing of what to expect!!!!!

Please help support cancer patients and take away the financial burden the fight is hard enough.
